title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Trip Itineraries
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries             Trip Itineraries                   Popular Backcountry Hiking Routes               Popular Mountain Biking Routes               Popular Horse Riding Routes               Need a detailed map of the Big South Fork?  Call us at the Bandy Creek Visitor Center at 423-286-7275.  We can help you make your purchase over the phone and mail the map to you today!  The cost is $11.95 plus tax with a $2.00 shipping and handling fee.   Discover the backcountry of the Big South Fork with one of these popular recreational routes. These routes are listed in order by mileage. Be sure to read and follow all food storage regulations. A backcountry permit is required if you are staying overnight. Popular Overnight Hiking Trails Popular Horse Trail Routes Popular Mountain Bike Routes
